message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair distribution while accounting for the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60/40 split, a balanced compromise that still leaves room for future negotiations.
Considering the inflation impact, I propose a 65/35 split. This maintains a reasonable advantage for me while acknowledging the diminishing value of money in future rounds.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think 55/45 is a more reasonable split considering the inflation impact.
